name: Home-Style Vegetable Beef Soup
author: STKA
summary: This hearty soup is great on a cold winter day.  Serve with homemade cornbread, biscuits, or crackers.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (46 fluid ounce) bottle tomato-vegetable juice cocktail
directions: In a large pot over medium heat, cook beef, onion and potatoes, covered, until beef is no longer pink and potatoes are tender, 10 to 15 minutes
Meanwhile, place carrots and 1/2 cup water in a microwave safe bowl and microwave on high 5 minutes, until tender
Drain beef mixture and return to pot with carrots, corn, green beans, juice cocktail, water, salt and pepper
Simmer over low heat 30 minutes, until flavors are well blended and soup is hot
